name: vulnerator
description: Tool that helps you to keep your repository safe

vulnerator.errorColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing errors. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.errorTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing errors. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.warningColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing warnings. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.warningTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing warnings. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.infoColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing info. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.infoTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing info. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.hintColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing hints. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.hintTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing hints. (Alpha is used)

vulnerator.fontStyle.description: Show ErrorLens annotations in Italics, or not?

vulnerator.fontWeight.description: Specifies the font weight for ErrorLens annotations.

vulnerator.fontMargin.description: Distance between end of the code line, and the start of the ErrorLens annotation. (CSS units).

vulnerator.enabledDiagnosticLevels.description: Specify which diagnostic levels are enhanced. e.g. [ 'error', 'warning' ]. Valid values are any or all of: 'error', 'warning', 'info' & 'hint'

vulnerator.statusBarControl.description: Specify when the ErrorLens status bar text should be shown.

vulnerator.addAnnotationTextPrefixes.description: If 'true', prefixes the diagnostic severity ('Error:', 'Warning:' etc) to ErrorLens annotations.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
